text: Cynthia Ellen Nixon (born April 9, 1966) is an American actress, activist and politician. She is most well known role comes from playing Miranda Hobbes in the HBO series Sex and the City (1998-2004). She has had other movie and TV starring acts as well. In 2016, she played Nancy Reagan in the television movie Killing Reagan. On March 19, 2018, she announced via Twitter that she was running for Governor of New York. ==References== Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Actors from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:LGBT people from New York City Category:Bisexual people Category:American political activists Category:American progressives Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:1966 births Category:Living people
title: Cynthia Nixon
